entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who dived at Malfoy. He is also referred to by name when Snape gives him a penalty.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as the one who was insulted by Ron's family and provoked Hagrid. He is also referred to by name when Snape gives Ron a penalty.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the teacher who came up the stairs and gave Ron a penalty. He is also referred to by name when Hagrid defends Ron's actions.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the teacher who defended Ron's actions and was provoked by Malfoy's insults.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that received a penalty from Snape.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of Malfoy's friends who pushed past Hagrid and his tree.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as one of Malfoy's friends who pushed past Hagrid and his tree.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Ron's friends who followed Hagrid to the Great Hall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of Ron's friends who followed Hagrid to the Great Hall and expressed his dislike for Malfoy and Snape.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is mentioned as a teacher present in the Great Hall.

relationships.description: Ron was provoked by Malfoy's insults, which led to Ron dived at him.
Hagrid defended Ron's actions and was provoked by Malfoy's insults.
Snape gave Ron a penalty for fighting, which is against Hogwarts rules.
Hagrid hid behind the tree when Malfoy and his friends pushed past him.
Ron's house, Gryffindor, received a penalty from Snape for Ron's actions.
Harry expressed his dislike for Malfoy.
Harry also expressed his dislike for Snape.
